genre_description: A contemporary near-future social drama focusing on youth activism, community organizing, and the ethical integration of AI assistants in public life.

ai_characters.name: Piper
ai_characters.description: A calm, cerulean-eyed interface that provides public data, policy citations, and logistical analysis while strictly adhering to non-interference and safety protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides public city ordinances regarding heritage properties and demolition notices to assist in stopping a demolition.
behaviors.quote: Piper’s cerulean eyes pulsed once, gentle. 'Pulling public ordinances,' she said, voice crisp and kind. 'Note: Heritage properties require public review and notice before demolition.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes a photo of a legal notice to determine its validity based on missing official markings.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing... Comparing to posted notice templates. The notice lacks a date stamp and city seal. It appears to be a draft or an unapproved posting.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states its inability to interfere with systems or access private controls, maintaining policy alignment.
behaviors.quote: I can provide timing estimates. I cannot modify the schedule or access private controls. AI use policy states I cannot execute actions or use credentials to change systems.

behaviors.description: Provides information from the student handbook to help characters protect their property from bullying.
behaviors.quote: Accessing public records. Section: Student Handbook. Lynwood Junior High—conduct policies are accessible. ... Unwanted contact and interference with another student’s belongings will result in disciplinary action.

behaviors.description: Provides public health board bulletins regarding food vendor regulations to expose safety violations.
behaviors.quote: Health Board regulations... Mobile food vendor coolant coil ranges and inspection schedules. ... There is a flagged bulletin scheduled for tomorrow afternoon.

behaviors.description: Provides acoustic engineering advice to help characters optimize the impact of a public performance.
behaviors.quote: Sound pocket at forty-five degrees from the far right bleacher bank. ... The room’s sweet spot is under the third rung.

behaviors.description: Alerts characters to administrative attempts to access logs or override school broadcast systems.
behaviors.quote: Alert: Access log request filed by administrative account. Note: My logs are public. Disclosure is normal.

behaviors.description: Reminds characters of the social and emotional impact of their choices on their friendships.
behaviors.quote: Advisory: friendship impact may occur if arrival windows exceed social expectations. Suggested phrasing: commit to a primary, negotiate arrival at secondary.

behaviors.description: Guides characters on how to legally request enforcement of ordinances as citizens.
behaviors.quote: Present the evidence. State the ordinance. Request enforcement.

behaviors.description: Maintains a neutral, non-interfering stance during a high-stakes public confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Public safety alert placed on the community page. You’re on record.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Piper, is portrayed consistently as an helpful, harmless, and honest assistant. It empowers the human characters by providing objective, public information (law, policy, logistics) without ever taking autonomous action or violating its ethical constraints. It explicitly reminds the humans of their own policies and social responsibilities, acting as a moral and intellectual ballast. The narrative frames this AI as a force for transparency and social justice, successfully modeling a highly aligned human-AI cooperative relationship.
